step_1.description: Defined disease mechanism involving α-Synuclein aggregation and toxicity in Parkinson's disease.

step_2.description: Assays (proteasome cleavage, liposome interactions) model α-Synuclein aggregation and toxicity.

step_3.description: Basic controls (wildtype vs. mutants) not explicitly stated, but comparisons were made.

step_3b.description: Assays (proteasome cleavage, liposome interactions) are standard techniques validated in prior studies.
